messages.message:
cool, we're almost done migrating to crafting-cyp, just a few tests left (see https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/58893#issuecomment-2183157661)

• drives—we're getting unauthorized when trying to change the default drive, is the drives account missing perms? @Weiming Wu 
• advanced-apps—we're getting failed to create the app, is there something wrong with the backend here?
• review-manager-dashboard—somehow all the numbers are zero?
we can also merge this without fixing these tests; i'll skip them. but :shrug:
drives is failing because it's missing the other two drives that should exist, I think
Wait... the drives test user is in the same org as the other test users... Is that safe?
The drives tests change default drive
oh, probably not :/
Yea, we've always had a different org for this
uh when did the time remaining change design change to a tag for the dashboards
It was one of the changes for home page refresh
hm, was that supposed to happen for the review dashboard as well though?
Yes
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/58774
ah okay, i should I have reviewed that PR as well since I was tagged

Advanced apps were due to:
1. The enterprise org admin didn't have a permission
2. The advanced app didn't exist
Both of these should be ok now

So the only remaining thing is that the drives tests shouldn't be operating in the same org as the others... I don't suppose there's a way to add the <mailto:support-testing+cypress.drives@instabase.com|support-testing+cypress.drives@instabase.com> user to another org?
It seems like the counts just failed to load in time for the manager test. Maybe the server was being slow not sure. The long term fix I should do is wait for them to load before checking.
i've seen a similar kind of failure for the manager test in other PRs
for the drives test, i dunno?
for <mailto:support-testing+cypress.drives@instabase.com|support-testing+cypress.drives@instabase.com>, a user should be able to have access to multiple orgs, right? @Xindi Xu
No. One user can only be in one org. I just moved the cypress drive user to a new org
I just created the drives and workspaces for the drives tests
@Udit lmk when you make a fix to the manager test
if you want to get this in for td then you can skip it, I’ll prob get a fix in on monday
i don'tt hink there's a rush to migrate to crafting-cyp, so i'll wait
